ValidationRule.description: A passcode can not consist of the same digit repeated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Admin API Only", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator" , OR ( REGEX(Passcode__c, "^[0]*$"), REGEX(Passcode__c, "^[1]*$"), REGEX(Passcode__c, "^[2]*$"), REGEX(Passcode__c, "^[3]*$"), REGEX(Passcode__c, "^[4]*$"), REGEX(Passcode__c, "^[5]*$"), REGEX(Passcode__c, "^[6]*$"), REGEX(Passcode__c, "^[7]*$"), REGEX(Passcode__c, "^[8]*$"), REGEX(Passcode__c, "^[9]*$") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Passcode does not meet provisioning requirements. Please revise.
